message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. 60/40 split seems fair.
I think a 60/40 split is fairer, with me getting the larger share this time.  Let's see if you agree.
Bob, let's be realistic. I'm offering a 55/45 split.  We both lose if this drags on.
I'm sticking with my previous offer.  I believe a 60/40 split is the fairest way to divide the money.  Let's not let inflation eat away at our potential gains!
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm coming down to 52/48. Take it or leave it - we're both losing money!
I'm still holding out for a 60/40 split, Alice. It's the fairest way to divide the money. Let's not let this go any further and accept this deal.
